results.text: but those who hope in the Lord will renew their strength. They will soar on wings like eagles; they will run and not grow weary, they will walk and not be faint.
results.reason: Finding strength in the Lord through hope and renewal.
results.reflection: When we place our hope in the Lord, He renews our strength and enables us to persevere.

results.text: I can do all this through him who gives me strength.
results.reason: Drawing strength from Christ to accomplish all things.
results.reflection: Our strength comes from Christ, empowering us to face any challenge with confidence.

results.text: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.
results.reason: Finding strength and refuge in God's presence.
results.reflection: In times of trouble, God is our constant source of strength and protection.

results.text: Finally, be strong in the Lord and in his mighty power.
